FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: This will display to the user as the email address who sent this email. Sendgrid will send the verification email to the address you enter in this field

TO_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: This is an email address which you want to notify

EMAIL_SUBJECT.description: This is an email subject which you send

SFDC_LOGIN_URL.description: In case you want to login sandbox, please enter https://test.salesforce.com

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: After install, enter sendgrid API key. Please refer to https://sendgrid.com/docs/ui/account-and-settings/api-keys/#creating-an-api-key for creating API key
